scripts.docs:update: npm run docs:generate-nav && npm run copy-docs
scripts.deploy: npm version patch && npm run build && aws s3 sync dist s3://aws-starter-app --delete && aws cloudfront create-invalidation --distribution-id E3HMJW9ME79W32 --paths "/*"
scripts.deploy:patch: npm version patch && npm run build && aws s3 sync dist s3://aws-starter-app --delete && aws cloudfront create-invalidation --distribution-id E3HMJW9ME79W32 --paths "/*"
scripts.deploy:minor: npm version minor && npm run build && aws s3 sync dist s3://aws-starter-app --delete && aws cloudfront create-invalidation --distribution-id E3HMJW9ME79W32 --paths "/*"
scripts.deploy:major: npm version major && npm run build && aws s3 sync dist s3://aws-starter-app --delete && aws cloudfront create-invalidation --distribution-id E3HMJW9ME79W32 --paths "/*"
